name: Midnight Wraith
description:
You wake up from a nightmare and weird things start to happen in your appartement.

Notes appear on the ground and give you instructions to exorcise the spirit who wants to kill you.

You can control the character with WASD or a joystick.

The game was made by :

-Mathias Davril (Programming)

-Antoine Lag (Graphisms)

-Elena David (Sound Design)
